seed_pair.known: It doesn't feel like a long time.

S0608: Habría sido lo sensato que hacer.
It would have been the sensible thing to do.
S0609: Lo sensato que hacer habría sido preguntar.
The sensible thing to do would have been to ask.
S0610: He needs to look for work.
S0611: Yo habría estado preparado para buscar en otro lugar.
I would have been ready to look somewhere else.
S0613: Probablemente habríamos comprado una casa allí.
We probably would have bought a house there.
S0614: Está cerca de donde vive tu familia.
It's near where your family live.
S0615: Pensé que fuiste muy valiente al decir eso.
I thought you were very brave to say that.
S0616: Fuiste muy valiente al decir que pensabas eso.
You were very brave to say you thought that.
S0617: You thought that it was a mistake.
